title: Keyboard Focus goes to previous user comment rather than comment being edited
description:
### Summary

When a user is editing a comment the Keyboard focus goes to an earlier user comment rather than staying on the comment that is actively being edited. Can't replicate on release candidate.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Edit a comment on a post with multiple comments including a parent comment by the current user focus will move to the parent comment while typing. 

### Platform information

Native Mobile

### App version

User Reported.

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Keyboard jumps to previous comment of user.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Have keyboard focus fixed on comment being edited.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![keyboard_focus_moving_to_post_from_comment](/uploads/9611678c875d843acfd9424dda97a671/keyboard_focus_moving_to_post_from_comment.mp4)


### Source

User Reported by ChrisDooBetter

https://www.minds.com/media/1045762275262439424

title: Update react-native-elements fix breaking changes
Checkbox doesn't support testID
Add waits to login e2e to fix CI errors and improve the reliability
Numeric font weight issue on android
Need to clear the cache when logging out / creating a new user
description:
Steps to recreate:

On IOS 13, running 3.12.0

Log out of the app as a user with a feed and content
Create a new user
Go to their Home screen
You will see the old user's feed even though the new user is not subscribed to them

title: top bar clock and info invisible on ios 13 (dark mode)
white font on ios 13
React native navigation laggy and leaky on IOS 13
description:
Steps to reproduce:
Install the latest build via testflight
Open the app and navigate through various tabs
After about 8-10 navigations, the UI will start to become laggy and slow to respond

It looks like this is an issue with https://github.com/react-navigation/react-navigation/

title: Build release candidate 3 of 3.12
Crash on channel registration subscribe to other channels step
description:
### Summary

When registering a new user app crashes on second step of channel registration, select channels to subscribe to.

### Steps to reproduce

1. On iOS register a new channel
2. Select preferred tags and click next
3. App crashes on the subscribe to other channels step

### Platform information

iOS Native App

### App version

1.12.0 rc_2

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

App crashes

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

App should not crash

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![crash_on_suggested_channels_step](/uploads/8fe0c538172ec698463671734883c499/crash_on_suggested_channels_step.mp4)

* delete the channel

title: my channel e2e tests
description:
* open my channel
* check header is rendered
* test edit mode (change the display name and save)
* post a text post
* check if the post is prepended into the channel's feed
* switch between the tabs: image, videos, blogs

title: post actions flow e2e test
description:
- [ ] post a text
- [ ] make sure the test is posted to the feed
- [ ] vote up the post
- [ ] make sure the up vote is counted
- [ ] down vote down the post
- [ ] make sure the down vote is counted 
- [ ] remind
- [ ] make sure the up vote is counted

title: Update spanish language in poeditor
Video select error with ios 13.1
Group description not loading
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

Cannot load group description, there are also reports that links cannot be clicked in group descriptions.
I've included the groups description in this card as I suspect they're related; if it turns out not to be please split this into a new card.

### Steps to reproduce

1. Visit the Help and Support group
2. Try to see description
3. If you can see it, try to click link in description

### Platform information 

reported v3.10.1 iOS IPhone XL

replicated S10, Android 9.0. v3.12.0 

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

Cannot load group description, there are also reports that links cannot be clicked in group descriptions.

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

Should load description, and links should be clickable, ideally warning users of navigation away from the app.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![image](/uploads/be467f7a927eba37dd0ac4fc52d5bf66/image.png)

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

Let's try changing mobile so it functions like web and calls `api/v1/groups/group`

title: Intermittent detox framework not found error
Implement transcoding message for videos
description: Currently is showing an error loading the thumbs for videos that are being transcoding

title: Merge and build 3.12 release candidate 2
Add detox e2e to CI
Translation failing on mobile
description:
Steps to fix:

- [ ] Translation selector defaults to user i18n language preference. 

https://gitlab.com/minds/mobile-native/issues/1509#note_245084442
> It's not a regression. The translation service sometimes fails when it can't detect what language its supposed to be translating from. We should implement a friendlier error message saying so.

- [ ] Add an error message or alert when source language is not detected by translation service.

title: Replace react-native-media-meta to get video length
react-native-minds-encryption fix ios support for RN 0.61
Implement new gathering screens with jitsi 2.4.0
Remove abandoned / deprecated boost code from Mobile
description:
@gthouret has indentified as dead code.

@msantang78 can you verify that this code is no longer being used and clean it up.


Boost API Usage

| Boost API | Platform | File Reference | Comment
| ------ | ------ | ------ | ------ |
| `api/v1/boost/fetch/newsfeed` | Mobile | `src/newsfeed/NewsfeedService.js` | `NewsfeedService.getBoosts()` function, queries with `limit \|\| ''`, `offset \|\| ''`, `rating \|\| 1`, `platform= ios \|\| other` Used by `NewsFeedStore.loadBoosts()` and `NewsFeedStore.loadFeed()` |
| `api/v2/boost/feed` | Mobile | `src/common/services/boosted-content.service.js` | `BoostedContentService.load()` function, queries with `limit=12`, `offset=0` Seems to be a basic service for fetching boosts using `FeedsService`.  Can't find any usage within mobile app?!?  I think this is code copied over from the Web app |

description: The new shared intent library returns the path with the format content://... we need to add logic to handle it

title: Restructure app navigation
description:
Create a switch navigator that contains the stack for the main app, the auth, and the gathering screen.
Because the JitsiMeet screen in a stack navigator has a bug where you can tap over the screen and it fires the taps on the previous screen components too

description: Is not longer needed with the new version of jitsi because the video call is now a component of the same screen

### Summary

Cannot vote up a post from a group, in your newsfeed

### Steps to reproduce

2. Try upvote

### Platform information

iOS

v3.10.0

Error message shown

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

It should allow you to upvote/downvote.

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

### Possible fixes

(If you can, link to the line of code that might be responsible for the problem)

title: Replace cookie manager for RN >= 0.60
Channels is showing alert twice if the user has lost permissions
Ensure that the native apps work with the new Unleash integration
Handle 403 response in services
description:
Clear the cached data if the user doesn't have permissions for a given entity
Ensure that the UI will react to the async synchronization of the entity (The app will show the cached entity and after that receive a 403 when it tries to update it from the server)

title: Voting errors

Tapped on date to go to original post

Tapped upvote and it errored

Same thing happens when tapping on date to post page from newsfeed.

title: Change channel mode modal with confirmation and debounce error
description: When editing a channel mode, we need to prevent a user from flooding the system with change mode events, since we need to reindex their entire channel when they change from open/moderated to closed. A new modal should explain the differences between the channel modes and handle the error from the api if they get rate limited

title: Deprioritize search results with no avatar
description: Web and mobile![Screenshot_20191009-181033_Minds](/uploads/3c55296dd7e62bf87efc15647f9686e7/Screenshot_20191009-181033_Minds.jpg)

title: (bug) Could not load notification (referrals) on Mobile
description:
<!---
Please read this!

Before opening a new issue, make sure to search for keywords in the issues
filtered by the "T - Bug" label and verify the issue you're about to submit isn't a duplicate.
--->

### Summary

The text for pending and complete referrals are not loading correctly on mobile.  See screenshot

### Steps to reproduce

1) Have a referral notification in your notifications list (`referral_complete` or `referral_pending`)
2) Open notifications and scroll to the referral notifications

### Platform information

Android 8.1.0

### App version

v3.10.1 (310033)

### What is the current *bug* behavior?

The notifications read "Could not load notification referral_complete"

### What is the expected *correct* behavior?

The actual notification message as it appears on web "You've earned tokens for the completed referral of [Name]"

### Relevant logs and/or screenshots

![mobile-referralnotifications](/uploads/92553e99de3d59ce5bf579a2ae6bc10a/mobile-referralnotifications.png)

### Possible fixes

Still need to dive into the code here to provide more details but it seems that these strings aren't part of the mobile app or aren't associated with these notification types.

title: Comments and Posts on Mobile native use username when they should use display name
description:
When you use the web version of the app comments us the display name of the channel. Currently on the native app comments are using the username of the channel. 

- [ ] Comments use display name of the channel
- [ ] Posts use display name of the channel

![image](/uploads/0913c8d76bcd424d75887cad943543eb/image.png)

title: Implement google play build to CI
description:
## Tasks
- [ ] fastlane
- [ ] CI job to run in parallel with OSS version

## More information
In order to prevent the **google play** app from replacing the **oss** app when there is a new update, the **oss** app has a much greater version number. @msantang78 can give more information.

title: Implement plot.ly for react-native
description: Please note if there are existing libraries.

title: Implement Detox for Mobile e2e
description: [Detox](https://github.com/wix/Detox) is a new tool for mobile e2e testing. Appium looks to have a lot of issues, and I think this has hopes of helping us have reliable e2e tests very quickly.

title: Pull to refresh on android discovery screen doesn't render the puller
description: It looks like the puller is hidden being the search bars.

title: (feat) move comment action sheet to other component
When a video is played, sent put requests to the back end for better analytics
description:
Mark is adding a new endpoint to help us better track video plays

From Mark:

endpoint should be api/v2/analytics/plays

so PUT api/v2/analytics/plays/:guid

When a user hits play, update that endpoint with the video's guid

title: Refactor ActivityActionSheet to permissions and optimize the permissions check to run only when needed
